textBeforeTable: Illinois Market Comparison The average home price in Illinois is $158,300, which is 35.9% lower than the average sold price in Illinois ($246,830) . The average home price per square foot in Illinois is $90 and about 2% of all homes in Illinois sold in the last 6 months. For Illinois home values, real estate prices, and city market trends, research the 3,884,350 property records or search our 80,910 recently sold or 94,064 homes for sale listings. The listings and properties in Illinois are only a part of the 105,538,848 properties and 2,944,812 homes for sale in United States. Because of this, the average home price and average home value of Illinois also influence the average home price $199,924 and average sale price $308,183 of United States. Listing counts, Illinois home prices and home values in Illinois are sourced daily from listing and property data on realtor.com®, which is the most up-to-date and accurate aggregation of real estate listings in the industry and includes approximately 800 regional MLSs and is the official website of the National Association of Realtors®.
